fields.name: Old Fashioned
fields.description: A classic whiskey cocktail. Simple, delicious, and strong.

fields.name: Bramble
fields.description: A tart and delicious gin based cocktail. Best made as a double, this cocktail is dangerously delicious and easy to make. With only 4 ingredients, the hardest part is getting the final pour of blackberry (or blackcurrant) liqueur to great the beautiful white-red gradient look.

fields.name: Cosmopolitan
fields.description: Many people's go to vodka mixer - this drink is tart and refreshing. Can be made sweeter with a more generous pour of cranberry juice.

fields.name: Mojito
fields.description: Mojito is a traditional Cuban highball.

fields.name: Paper Plane
fields.description: Dangerous and daring. Almost every ingredient has some ABV rating, so drink at your own risk.
